title: Spacious 2bd 2 ba Minutes From Dining and Shopping
posting_body: ['Find the Perfect Apartment Home', 'Shadowcreek makes for a peaceful retreat in the historic and quaint town of Campbell.', 'Recently refreshed inside and out, the apartment homes at Shadowcreek feature one and two bedroom floor plans with contemporary kitchens, huge private patios and balconies, large closets, additional storage and much, much more.', 'Start your day with a morning swim in the sparkling pool or exercise in the fitness center.', 'When it’s time to relax, enjoy the beautiful courtyard and lush landscaping.', 'You’ll find shopping and entertainment nearby at Downtown Campbell and the Pruneyard Shopping District.', 'And when you return home, you can park in your reserved covered parking space.', 'Without a doubt, Shadowcreek offers the best in apartment living.', '-On-Site Management', '-Healthy Living:', 'Community is Designated as Non-Smoking', '-Guest Parking', '-Pet-Friendly', '-Fitness Center', '-Storage Space', '-Spa', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Barbecue w/ Picnic Area', '-Near Los Gatos Creek Park & Trail', '-Covered Parking', '-Package Lockers', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.']
